articles.title: FTSE 100 finally has its day in the sun as record high is set - The Times
articles.description: Like London buses, you wait nearly five years for the FTSE 100 to set a record high and then two come along in the space of a week.The most recent was on Thursday when the Footsie, home to the country’s biggest listed companies, struck its highest level since…
articles.content:
